description.value:
School transmutation; Level summoner 4, unchained Summoner 4;

Casting Time 1 standard action
Components V, S, M (a chameleon scale)

Range touch
Targets your eidolon
Duration 1 minute/level
Saving Throw Will negates (harmless);  Spell Resistance no

Description

This spell functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.c5ipv2mivkdb03sb]{lesser evolution surge}, except that you can grant any two evolutions whose total cost does not exceed 6 evolution points.
